answers.answer: Hi,The pain may be related to a nerve problem. It may be due to Sciatica or Peripheral neuropathy. The causes could be spinal nerve compression in the back,  compression of peripheral nerves due to tumours, scars and infection, Vitamin deficiency, Diabetes, Underactive thyroid, Raynaud’s phenomenon and many others. Please go for MRI of the spine and leg and consult a neurologist. Hope this helps you. Take care and regards!
